name: Dizzy Plane
description:
Are you dizzy? You have to play this game!

I am dizzy! I'm dizzy thinking about what kind of game I should make. so play this game, I'm already dizzy thinking about it.

Yes, keep turning until you get dizzy! >:V

Game for Kenney Jam 2021

Controls

A-D / Left-Right Arrow,Turn left/rightW / Up ArrowBoost your speedLeft ClickShoot

Check out our other games if you're already dizzy

More games  , more , and more !

Music : FesliyanStudios
